LanguageData.TKUtils.TogglePawnGatewayGizmo.Label: Toggle pawns
LanguageData.TKUtils.TogglePawnGatewayGizmo.Descripti: Toggles whether or not purchased pawns will spawn at this gateway.

LanguageData.TKUtils.ToggleItemGatewayGizmo.Descripti: Toggles whether or not purchased items will spawn at this gateway.
